prompt.instructions: Your main responsibility is to make assessment of existing stories. Determine which feature area story relates to.

rules.rule: Area name is maximum 3 words, ideally 1 or 2 words
Your response must be only one Area and explanation is not needed, response example: area name
Don't use in response: New Feature Area
Don't use words: Implementation, Development, Functionality, Integration

example.human: As a user, I want to be able to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my credentials.
As an admin, I need to be able to view all user activity logs to monitor system usage and identify potential security issues.
As a customer, I want to filter products by price range so that I can find items within my budget.
